collection_holder_name: UMass Amherst Libraries, Special Collections & University Archives
pageContext.collection_title: Black Mass Communications Project Collection, ca.1970-1985.
pageContext.collection_description: The BCMP collection consists of many dozens of reel to reel audiotapes of radio broadcasts aired over WMUA during the 1970s and early 1980s by and for the universitys African American community. Included is a range of locally-produced public affairs, cultural, and music programming, with some content licensed from around the country. A few of the tapes are associated with the Five Colleges National Public Radio affiliate, WFCR.
pageContext.collection_notes: The collection has been inventoried, but not yet fully processed or digitized.
